common.EROR_ENDDATE_BEFORE_STARTDATE: End date cannot be earlier than start date.
common.EROR_STARTDATE_BEFORE_ENDDATE: Start date cannot be after end date.

info.TITLE: Info
info.TXT_ABOUT: HOAY ("How old are you") a an app to calculate ages in years, months and days.
info.TXT_CODE: It is built with the JavaScript Framework AngularJS and PhoneGap. All source code is available at GitHub.
